original_text:
Big Bot Crew
La slot gratis e senza registrazione Big Bot Crew sviluppata da Quickspin e ambientata in una piccola metropoli, ti porterà a conoscere e ad aiutare un trio di ragazzini amanti della tecnologia, nella costruzione di un robot umanoide, chiamato appunto BigBot. Matsuo, Danielle e Joaquin ti accompagneranno in questo viaggio futuristico per realizzare le migliori combinazioni vincenti e per accumulare il maggior numero possibile di BigBot Respin. Leggi la nostra recensione per scoprire come…
Caratteristiche principali di Big Bot Crew
La struttura del gameplay presenta 5 rulli e 40 linee di pagamento, con 4 Jolly Bigbot che possono attivare la funzione Bigbot Respins per trasformare tutti e 5 i rulli in Wild e farti vincere fino a 5.203,2 volte la tua puntata. Puoi giocare da un minimo di 0,40€ fino a 100,00€ a giro su qualsiasi dispositivo. Aiuta la banda a terminare il lavoro e non perdere d’occhio i simboli sulla schermata, perché potrebbero nascondere interessanti sorprese!
Simboli robotici e funzioni spaziali
I simboli principali presenti sui rulli della slot senza scaricare Big Bot Crew includono:

4 Ingranaggi di colori diversi,
2 robot,
La banda dei 3 adolescenti tecnologici. Matsuo è il simbolo più gratificante che ti dà 7,5 volte la puntata per 5 su una linea di pagamento,
L’icona Bigbot ti aiuterà a sbloccare diversi premi. Bigbot è il Wild e se ne accumuli 5 su una payline, guadagnerai 10 volte la tua puntata. Ricorda che appare solo sui 3 rulli centrali e su tutti i rulli con 2 Bonus. Può anche spostarsi di posizione nel gioco standard e rimpiazzare tutti i simboli nella Barra Bonus.

Quali sono le Funzionalità Extra?

Funzione Bigbot Respins – Essa viene attivata giocata quando 2 o più Bigbot Wilds finiscono sui rulli. Il numero di Respins che otterrai è uguale al numero di Jolly di Bigbot completi che compariranno nel round di Trigger. Ogni atterraggio Wild Bigbot extra ti darà 1 respin extra: il Bigbot Wild rimane sui rulli e si sposta sulla bobina indicata all’inizio di ogni respin;
Funzione di Giri Gratuiti – Essa viene attivata quando ottieni 3 Bonus Scatter ovunque sui rulli. La tua ricompensa sarà pari ad 8 giri gratuiti. Come nella funzione Bigbot Respins, il Bigbot Wild rimane sui rulli e si sposta sulle bobine indicate all’inizio di ogni giro gratuito.

Un universo parallelo di vincite e Giri Gratis
La slot gratis Big Bot Crew ci ha fatto divertire e abbiamo compreso che tutto il gioco ruota intorno al Bigbot Wild che può ricompensare il giocatore con fantastici Respins Gratuiti. Le vincite di questa slot giocabile anche con soldi veri nei nostri casinò, possono davvero trasformarsi in premi di un altro pianeta con ricompense di oltre 5000 volte la tua puntata. In conclusione, se ami trafficare con le costruzioni e sei appassionato di tecnologia, ti consigliamo vivamente di provare questo gioco e aiutare la band a realizzare questo prototipo di umanoide davvero unico nel suo genere.

raw_translation.response:
Big Bot Crew is a thrilling game developed by Quickspin that takes place in a futuristic metropolis. You'll be helping a group of tech-savvy teenagers build a humanoid robot called BigBot while trying to win big with the best winning combinations and accumulate as many BigBot Respins as possible. The gameplay has 5 reels, 40 paylines, and 4 Bigbot Jokers that activate the Bigbot Respins feature to turn all 5 reels wild and help you win up to 5,203.2 times your bet. You can bet from €0.40 to €100 per spin on any device. Make sure to keep your eyes peeled for symbols on the screen that could lead to exciting surprises! 

This slot machine features robotic symbols and space-age functions. The main symbols include 4 different gears, 2 robots, and the band of 3 teenage techies. Matsuo is the most rewarding symbol, giving you 7.5 times your bet for 5 on a payline. The Bigbot icon will help you unlock various prizes. Bigbot is the Wild and if you accumulate 5 on a payline, you'll earn 10 times your bet. Remember that it only appears on the 3 central reels and on all reels with 2 bonuses. It can also move around during regular gameplay and replace all symbols in the Bonus Bar.

There are also two extra features to look out for. The Bigbot Respins function is activated when 2 or more Bigbot Wilds land on the reels. The number of respins you get is equal to the number of complete Bigbot Jokers that appear in the triggering round. Each extra Wild Bigbot that lands gives you an additional respin. The Wild Bigbot stays on the reels and moves to the indicated reel at the start of each respin. The Free Spins function is activated when you get 3 Bonus Scatters anywhere on the reels. You'll get 8 free spins as your reward. Like in the Bigbot Respins function, the Wild Bigbot stays on the reels and moves to the indicated reels at the start of each free spin.

This slot machine game is perfect for tech enthusiasts who love building and construction. You'll have a blast playing and developing the unique humanoid prototype alongside the band while potentially winning incredible prizes of over 5000 times your bet. In conclusion, if you're an experienced gambler looking for exciting gameplay, Big Bot Crew is definitely worth a try!

raw_translation.response:
Are you ready to embark on a futuristic journey through a bustling metropolis in the company of three tech-savvy teens? Big Bot Crew, the popular no-registration slot developed by Quickspin, brings you on an adventure that allows you to help the trio construct a humanoid robot by hitting the best winning combinations and raking in as many BigBot Respins as possible. The game features 5 reels and 40 paylines with the potential to multiply your bets up to a whopping 5,203.2 times your initial wager. 

The four Jolly Bigbot symbols present in the game activate the Bigbot Respins feature, turning all 5 reels into Wild and increasing your chances to win big. Whether you're playing on a desktop or a mobile device, you can bet between €0.40 and €100.00 per spin. Keep a lookout for the various robot-themed symbols and functions, as they often contain hidden surprises that can make all the difference in your gaming experience.

The main symbols present on the reels of Big Bot Crew include four differently colored gears, two robots, and the three tech whiz kids themselves. Matsuo, the most valuable symbol, rewards a generous 7.5 times your original bet for landing five on a payline. The Bigbot Wild icon helps unlock numerous bonuses and prizes. If you get lucky and accumulate five of the Bigbot Wilds on a payline, you'll earn an incredible 10 times your initial wager. Keep in mind that the Bigbot Wild only appears on the three central reels and on all reels containing two Bonus symbols. It can also move positions during the standard game and replace all symbols on the Bonus Bar.

Extra features abound in Big Bot Crew, including the Bigbot Respins bonus, which activates when two or more Bigbot Wilds land on the reels. The number of respins awarded corresponds to the number of complete Bigbot Wilds present in the triggering round. Each additional Wild Bigbot landing earns players an extra respin, with the Wild remaining on the reels and moving to the indicated reel at the start of each extra respin. The game also features a Free Spins bonus round, activated when three Bonus Scatters land anywhere on the reels. Players earn eight free spins, during which the Bigbot Wild remains on the reels and moves to the indicated reels for each spin.

All in all, Big Bot Crew has captivated players worldwide, drawing them into an immersive universe of parallel victories and free spins. Those with a passion for technology and an eye for construction are sure to enjoy this unique game while helping the trio create their one-of-a-kind humanoid robot prototype. So what are you waiting for? Join in on the fun and hit the virtual jackpot in Big Bot Crew!

message.content:
Are you ready to embark on a futuristic journey through a bustling metropolis in the company of three tech-savvy teens? Big Bot Crew, the popular no-registration slot developed by Quickspin, brings you on an adventure that allows you to help the trio construct a humanoid robot by hitting the best winning combinations and raking in as many BigBot Respins as possible. The game features 5 reels and 40 paylines with the potential to multiply your bets up to a whopping 5,203.2 times your initial wager. 

The four Jolly Bigbot symbols present in the game activate the Bigbot Respins feature, turning all 5 reels into Wild and increasing your chances to win big. Whether you're playing on a desktop or a mobile device, you can bet between €0.40 and €100.00 per spin. Keep a lookout for the various robot-themed symbols and functions, as they often contain hidden surprises that can make all the difference in your gaming experience.

The main symbols present on the reels of Big Bot Crew include four differently colored gears, two robots, and the three tech whiz kids themselves. Matsuo, the most valuable symbol, rewards a generous 7.5 times your original bet for landing five on a payline. The Bigbot Wild icon helps unlock numerous bonuses and prizes. If you get lucky and accumulate five of the Bigbot Wilds on a payline, you'll earn an incredible 10 times your initial wager. Keep in mind that the Bigbot Wild only appears on the three central reels and on all reels containing two Bonus symbols. It can also move positions during the standard game and replace all symbols on the Bonus Bar.

Extra features abound in Big Bot Crew, including the Bigbot Respins bonus, which activates when two or more Bigbot Wilds land on the reels. The number of respins awarded corresponds to the number of complete Bigbot Wilds present in the triggering round. Each additional Wild Bigbot landing earns players an extra respin, with the Wild remaining on the reels and moving to the indicated reel at the start of each extra respin. The game also features a Free Spins bonus round, activated when three Bonus Scatters land anywhere on the reels. Players earn eight free spins, during which the Bigbot Wild remains on the reels and moves to the indicated reels for each spin.

All in all, Big Bot Crew has captivated players worldwide, drawing them into an immersive universe of parallel victories and free spins. Those with a passion for technology and an eye for construction are sure to enjoy this unique game while helping the trio create their one-of-a-kind humanoid robot prototype. So what are you waiting for? Join in on the fun and hit the virtual jackpot in Big Bot Crew!

If you get lucky and accumulate five of the Bigbot Wilds on a payline, you'll earn an incredible 10 times your initial wager. Keep in mind that the Bigbot Wild only appears on the three central reels and on all reels containing two Bonus symbols. It can also move positions during the standard game and replace all symbols on the Bonus Bar.

Extra features abound in Big Bot Crew, including the Bigbot Respins bonus, which activates when two or more Bigbot Wilds land on the reels. The number of respins awarded corresponds to the number of complete Bigbot Wilds present in the triggering round. Each additional Wild Bigbot landing earns players an extra respin, with the Wild remaining on the reels and moving to the indicated reel at the start of each extra respin. The game also features a Free Spins bonus round, activated when three Bonus Scatters land anywhere on the reels. Players earn eight free spins, during which the Bigbot Wild remains on the reels and moves to the indicated reels for each spin.

All in all, Big Bot Crew has captivated players worldwide, drawing them into an immersive universe of parallel victories and free spins. Those with a passion for technology and an eye for construction are sure to enjoy this unique game while helping the trio create their one-of-a-kind humanoid robot prototype. So what are you waiting for? Join in on the fun and hit the virtual jackpot in Big Bot Crew!

Speaking of robot friends, the Bigbot Wild symbol is your best buddy in this game. He only appears on the three central reels and on all reels containing two Bonus symbols, which makes him a bit elusive, but it's totally worth the wait. Each additional Wild Bigbot landing earns players an extra respin, with the Wild remaining on the reels and moving to the indicated reel at the start of each extra respin. The game also features a Free Spins bonus round, activated when three Bonus Scatters land anywhere on the reels. Players earn eight free spins, during which the Bigbot Wild remains on the reels and moves to the indicated reels for each spin.

Betting Options

Whether playing on a desktop or mobile device, players can bet between €0.40 and €100.00 per spin.

Theme and Design

Big Bot Crew has a futuristic theme set in a bustling metropolis that follows the journey of three tech-savvy teens creating a humanoid robot prototype. The game is designed with robot-themed symbols and functions, which often reveal hidden surprises adding to the overall gaming experience. It is available to play on desktop and mobile devices.
